long_description: The colorful Speck CandyShell Grip case wraps your iPhone 5 in hard-shell protection with bands of rubber for grip and eye-catching style. Tough polycarbonate shell and soft interior provide 2 layers of protection; raised bezel and rubber button covers offer further protection. Interwoven plastic and rubber on the exterior create textured finger pads for grip and style. The Speck CandyShell Grip case features strategically placed ridges that help keep your thumbs aligned with buttons for easy tactile control. Note: this case does not protect against water.
short_description: The colorful Speck CandyShell Grip case wraps your iPhone 5 in hard-shell protection with bands of rubber for grip and eye-catching style.
